article.headline: Quinnipiac 89, Longwood 62
article.story: FARMVILLE, Va. (AP) -- Craig Benson scored 19 points and Rob Monroe had 15 points and 14 assists as Quinnipiac defeated Longwood 89-62 Saturday. C.J. Vick added 14 points and nine rebounds for the Bobcats (2-2). Quinnipiac never trailed, and held a 45-17 lead at halftime. Monroe, who was 3-for-4 on 3-pointers, scored the first 10 points of the game. Ten of his assists came in the first half. Lamar Barrett scored 18 points for the Lancers (0-4), and Maurice Sumter had nine points and a game-high 10 rebounds.
